mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_POST ( BOARD_P_SEQ, USER_SEQ, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_P_TITLE, BOARD_P_CONTENT, BOARD_COUNT, REG_DATE, UPDATE_USER_SEQ, UPDATE_DATE, EXP_YN ) VALUES ( BOARD_P_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_seq}, #{board_seq}, #{board_p_title}, #{board_p_content}, 0, SYSDATE, #{user_seq}, SYSDATE, 1 )
mapper.select:
SELECT BP.BOARD_P_SEQ, BP.USER_SEQ, BP.BOARD_P_TITLE, BP.BOARD_COUNT, BP.REG_DATE, BP.UPDATE_USER_SEQ, BP.UPDATE_DATE, BP.USER_NAME, BR.REPLY_TOTAL AS REPLY_TOTAL, IMG.FILE_PY_NAME AS file_py_name FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC) AS RN, BP.BOARD_P_SEQ AS BOARD_P_SEQ, BP.USER_SEQ AS USER_SEQ, BP.BOARD_P_TITLE AS BOARD_P_TITLE, BP.BOARD_P_CONTENT AS BOARD_P_CONTENT, BP.BOARD_COUNT AS BOARD_COUNT, TO_CHAR(BP.REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mm:ss') AS REG_DATE, BP.UPDATE_USER_SEQ AS UPDATE_USER_SEQ, BP.UPDATE_DATE AS UPDATE_DATE, UM.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME, UM.IMG_SEQ AS IMG_SEQ FROM BOARD_POST BP INNER JOIN USER_MEMBER UM ON BP.USER_SEQ = UM.USER_SEQ WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{board_seq} AND BP.EXP_YN = 1 ORDER BY BP.REG_DATE DESC, BP.BOARD_P_SEQ DESC ) BP LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(REPLY_SEQ) REPLY_TOTAL, BOARD_P_SEQ FROM BOARD_REPLY WHERE EXP_YN = 1 GROUP BY BOARD_P_SEQ ) BR ON BP.BOARD_P_SEQ = BR.BOARD_P_SEQ
INNER JOIN IMAGE IMG ON BP.IMG_SEQ = IMG.IMG_SEQ WHERE RN BETWEEN #{last_index} - 4 AND #{last_index}

SELECT BP.BOARD_P_SEQ, BP.USER_SEQ, BP.BOARD_P_TITLE, BP.BOARD_P_CONTENT, BP.BOARD_COUNT, TO_CHAR(BP.REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mm:ss') AS reg_date, BP.UPDATE_USER_SEQ, BP.UPDATE_DATE, UM.USER_NAME, BR.REPLY_COUNT as reply_total FROM BOARD_POST BP INNER JOIN USER_MEMBER UM ON BP.USER_SEQ = UM.USER_SEQ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(REPLY_SEQ) AS REPLY_COUNT ,BOARD_P_SEQ FROM BOARD_REPLY WHERE BOARD_P_SEQ = #{board_p_seq} AND EXP_YN = 1 GROUP BY BOARD_P_SEQ ) BR ON BP.BOARD_P_SEQ = BR.BOARD_P_SEQ WHERE BP.BOARD_P_SEQ = #{board_p_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_POST SET BOARD_COUNT = BOARD_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_P_SEQ = #{board_p_seq}
UPDATE BOARD_POST SET BOARD_P_TITLE = #{board_p_title}, BOARD_P_CONTENT = #{board_p_content}, UPDATE_USER_SEQ = #{update_user_seq}, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_P_SEQ = #{board_p_seq}
UPDATE BOARD_POST SET EXP_YN = -1 ,UPDATE_USER_SEQ = #{user_seq} ,UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_P_SEQ = #{board_p_seq}
